```{r}
library(ggplot2)
library(viridis)
library(readxl)


```

```{r}
soil_quality <- read_excel("C:/Users/Christopher Vest/Documents/Land_use_project/Land_use/Review/Christopher/soil_quality/Soil_Quality_Analysis.xlsx")

```

```{r Goochland}
ggplot(soil_quality, aes(x = `G_Value`, y = `G_Area_acre`, fill = `G_Area_acre`)) + geom_bar(stat = "identity") + coord_flip() + theme(legend.position = "none") + scale_x_discrete(limits = rev) + scale_fill_viridis() + labs( title = "Total Acreage by Soil Quality Classification", y = "Acreage", x = "Soil Quality Classification")
```

```{r Powhatan}
ggplot(soil_quality, aes(x = `P_Value`, y = `P_Area_acre`, fill = `P_Area_acre`)) + geom_bar(stat = "identity") + coord_flip() + theme(legend.position = "none") + scale_x_discrete(limits = rev) +   scale_fill_viridis() + labs( title = "Total Acreage by Soil Quality Classification", y = "Acreage", x = "Soil Quality Classification")
```
